list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'neutron'

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "cluster_name" = 'neutron' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "cluster_name" = 'neutron' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" = '5xx' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("upper_90") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'GET' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("upper_90") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'POST' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("upper_90") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'PUT' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("upper_90") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'DELETE' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_check_api" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'neutron-api' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" = '2xx' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" = '1xx' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" = '3xx' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" = '4xx' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "openstack_neutron_http_response_times" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" = '5xx' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "backend" = 'neutron-api' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "backend" = 'neutron-api' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'dhcp' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'dhcp' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'dhcp' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT state, last(value) FROM "openstack_neutron_agent" WHERE $timeFilter AND "environment_label" = '$environment'and service = 'dhcp' GROUP BY time($interval), hostname
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_neutron_agents" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment' AND "service" = 'l3' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with key = environment_label

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from pacemaker_local_resource_active with key = hostname where environment_label = '$environment'
